content:
A countdown post is a great way to build anticipation and excitement for your live session.

Here are some caption ideas for your countdown post:

**24 hours to go:**

* "The countdown begins! Only 24 hours until I go live on Reels! What do you want to see me talk about? Let me know in the comments! #ReelsLive #Countdown"
* "Get ready for a day of excitement! I'm going live on Reels in 24 hours! Stay tuned for updates and sneak peeks! #ReelsLive #ComingSoon"
* "The wait is almost over! Only 24 hours until my live Reels session! Who's ready to join me? #ReelsLive #Countdown"

**12 hours to go:**

* "Halfway there! Only 12 hours until I go live on Reels! What's on your mind? Ask me anything and I'll answer it live! #ReelsLive #QandA"
* "The suspense is building! Only 12 hours until my live Reels session! Make sure to tune in and be a part of the fun! #ReelsLive #Countdown"
* "It's getting real! Only 12 hours until I share some exciting stuff on Reels! Stay tuned for updates! #ReelsLive #ComingSoon"

**6 hours to go:**

* "The final countdown! Only 6 hours until I go live on Reels! Get ready for a blast! #ReelsLive #Countdown"
* "Almost there! Only 6 hours until my live Reels session! Make sure to set a reminder so you don't miss out! #ReelsLive #RemindMe"
* "The excitement is building! Only 6 hours until I share some awesome content on Reels! Who's ready? #ReelsLive #Hype"

**1 hour to go:**

* "It's time! Only 1 hour until I go live on Reels! Get ready to join the fun! #ReelsLive #Countdown"
* "The moment is here! Only 1 hour until my live Reels session! Join me and let's make it a memorable one! #ReelsLive #LiveNow"
* "Last chance to get ready! Only 1 hour until I go live on Reels! Don't miss out on the excitement! #ReelsLive #FinalCountdown"

Feel free to customize these captions to fit your tone and style, or use them as inspiration to create your own! Good luck with your live session!
